Name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Halloween Night
About the game: Happy Halloween! With this great Jigsaw Puzzle your Halloween will be extra scary, play from 30 to 1.000 pieces, Use your own Halloween photo to create a stunning puzzle or solve 100+ Jigsaw puzzles in 5 fearfull categories. Gather coins to discover the secret level, make a HD Wallpaper when solved. Halloween is not just only about masked people, costumes and candies. Halloween brings a special feeling in our heart, a part of our happy childhood, our memories, our life. Play the special Halloween cutouts, choose from tons of levels, feel the Halloween vibe and the colorful autumn season which comes with it! 5 Chapters + the Secret One Now you can save each level separately - unlimited number of save slots- increase the size of a puzzle up to 1000 pieces Try funny Halloween cutouts Customizable difficulty: from relaxing to challenging Customizable Brightness and Coloring HD quality levels Come back everyday to claim your rewards Add your own images in the library and start puzzling them! Spooky and relaxing soundtrack Take and use your most beloved levels as HD desktop wallpapers
